item.title: My favorate tools list
item.description: I prefer to use command line tools (CLI). Here is a list that I am using and enjoying. OS: debian/ubuntu (95%) + windows(5%) windows manager: FVWM reminder: conky+remind+wyrd calendar: conky+remind+web shell: zsh+tmux mail: mutt/getmail/msmtp contactor: abook document (doc): markdown (60%) + MS word (30%, under windows) + wps (10%) presentation: MS powerpoint (70%, under windows) + html5 slides (30%) scientific publish/thesis: latex (texlive) pdf reader: okular note: note editor: vim remote operating: ssh remote desktop: remmina virtual OS: virtualbox database: mysql file manager: ranger internet expolor: firefox + uzbl ftp: lftpd image editor: gimp music player: mocp video player: vlc data analysis: R/matlab/python dictionary: iciba.
